info.value: County beautification should be a priority. (FAQ Item) - 884967146

field_provus_body.value:
The County of Meridian has a standing beautification committee whose current priorities for beautification include:

  • Garbage/rubbish outside bins at all downtown businesses
  • Adoption of a Housing Ordinances
    • Tall grass and weeds (more than 8 inches)
    • Exterior issues such as excessive debris in a yard, house paint peeling
  • Certificate of Occupancy (for non-owner occupied rental properties) will be required Sidewalks of local businesses for shovel and clearing of snow and ice
  • Illegal dumping
  • Parking violations
  • Graffiti
  • Abandoned vehicles

To learn more about or contact the Meridian Beautification Committee, property-related concerns, visit this page.
